content.rendered:
Directed by Ti West

Written by Ti West. Mia Goth

Star Mia Goth(Pearl). Tandi Wright(Ruth). Alistair Sewell(Howard). Amelia Reid(Margaret). Gabe McDonnell(Woman). Lauren Stewart(Pianist). Todd Rippon(Director). Grace Acheson(Ticket Taker). David Corenswet(The Projectionist). Emma Jenkins-Purro(Mitzy). Matthew Sunderland(Pearl’s Father)

Language English. German

Producers Jared Connon. Kid Cudi. Dennis Cummings. Mia Goth. Jacob Jaffke. Harrison Kreiss. Ashley Levinson. Sam Levinson. Karina Manashil. Peter Phok. Kevin Turen. Ti West

Production Production companies. A24. Bron Creative. Little Lamb
